### 2. Scripts Created

1. **`scripts/generate-daily-journal.py`** (477 lines)
   - Generates all 365 daily journal pages
   - Supports both Portuguese and English
   - Includes date localization and template filling

2. **`scripts/generate-monthly-indexes.py`** (213 lines)
   - Creates monthly index pages with calendar view
   - Organizes days into weeks
   - Provides navigation between months

3. **`scripts/validate-journal.py`** (238 lines)
   - Validates file structure and completeness
   - Checks frontmatter and content sections
   - Generates validation reports

### 3. Documentation

1. **`DAILY_JOURNAL_README.md`** (211 lines)
   - Complete documentation of the system
   - Usage instructions
   - Statistics and structure overview

2. **Index pages created**:
   - Main journal index (pt & en)
   - 2025 year index (pt & en)
   - 2026 year index (pt & en)
   - 12 monthly indexes per language
